# üêû Bug Report

### Description

<!-- ‚úçÔ∏è--> 
Slasher producing so much error per second after got enabled after 66% participation rate. Not sure if these indices are repeated in the log. I will update asap after comb a bit more thru the log.

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

<!-- Did this behavior use to work in the previous version? -->
<!-- ‚úçÔ∏è--> Yes, however this issue seems like it has to do with the recent roughtime incident

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

1. Turn off slasher so that beacon-chain can reach to head
2. Wait until beacon-chain reaches to head and validators start to attest, then turn on slasher
3. Observing the slasher log.

## üî• Error
